about.title: About Me
about.text: Hi, I'm Gloria Macarena Rico, a student in Software Development, passionate about artificial intelligence and fullstack development. I love solving complex problems, collaborating with others, and I'm constantly seeking professional growth.
about.quote: I'm not satisfied with learning the minimum. The minimum never reaches my dreams.

home.name: Gloria Macarena Rico
home.role: Developer in training with a passion for AI
home.highlight: Building solutions with logic, empathy, and coffee.

aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.bio: I'm Gloria Macarena Rico, a student of Software Development. I define myself by my commitment, adaptability, and critical thinking. I enjoy solving complex problems, working in teams, and learning from every challenge. Currently, I specialize in full stack development and artificial intelligence, and I seek to grow professionally by bringing value and creativity.
aboutSection.quote: Why hire me? Because I turn challenges into learning opportunities and solutions.

footer.phrase: The best part of this portfolio hasn't been written yet
